
RapidEnv development environment
  Project: test, Tag: main

Properties:
  = my_osspecific_path = "/opt/postgres"
  p my_perso_prop = "xyz"
  ! myapp.home: new common property with value "@RAPIDENV_HOME@/testdata/testinstall/myapp/1.0.2" should be introduced.
  ! otherapp.data: new personal property needs to be specified
  ! otherapp.testcommon: new common property with value "xyz" should be introduced.

Install units:
  ! myapp 1.0.2 installation required
  - otherapp 1.0 optional
